CASE
The equivalent to a switch-case in other programming languages, the query will
search for the first condition that is met, once that condition is true it
will stop reading and return the result, in case that no condition is met, 
the ELSE clasuse will be executed
{{{
CASE
	WHEN condition1 THEN result1
	WHEN condition2 THEN result2
	WHEN condition3 THEN result3
	ELSE result
END;	
	}}}
